original_title: Battleship 'Odin' with All Her Guns in Action
overview: This British Bioscope short from 1900 is a crackerjack piece, on an order with 1903's FIREBOAT 'NEW YORKER' ANSWERING AN ALARM. It's little more than a perfectly framed picture of the Odin slowly leaving harbor, with all her guns ablaze in the roiling clouds and flashes of cordite.
title: Battleship 'Odin' with All Her Guns in Action
